forWebsite.heading: Come visit us at MIOPIA 2025
forWebsite.text: Come visit us at the stand area of the MIOPIA event to learn more about Vesko. The MIOPIA 2025 event will be held in Joensuu on 12.3. 2025 Metria UEF. It is a business and student-focused event that brings together the ICT and retail industries, startups, creative professionals, regional developers, and passionate individuals. Visit MIOPIA website

registration.location: MIOPIA will be held at Metria UEF in Joensuu on Wednesday, 12.3.2025.
registration.text: Register & book your place, it’s free of charge.

about.heading: What is MIOPIA?
about.subheading: The MIOPIA 2025 event will be held in Joensuu on 12.3.2025. It is a business and student-focused event that brings together the ICT and retail industries, startups, creative professionals, regional developers, and passionate individuals.
about.p2Text2: side-event, concentrating on three critical themes:
about.p2Text3: MIOPIA aims to strengthen Joensuu’s position as a digital and innovation hub.
about.p3Text: The event offers attendees a compact yet engaging program featuring inspiring keynote speakers, a company stand area for networking with students and talents, and a dedicated networking session for companies.

option1.title: Technology
option1.description: Technology drives modern life, evolving rapidly and requiring businesses to adapt quickly to stay competitive in the digital age.

option2.title: Digital Customer
option2.description: The Digital Customer theme highlights an often-overlooked topic in many industries: effectively reaching customers through digital channels to drive business growth.

option3.title: Students
option3.description: Joensuu is home to over 20,000 students, including many international and exchange students, representing a vital resource for the growth of Joensuu and the North Karelia region.

speakers.heading: Keynote Speakers of MIOPIA 2025
speakers.speaker2: Principal Lecturer of Entrepreneurship at Karelia UAS and Samota Co-founder at Hifiction Oy
speakers.speaker4: Senior Business Advisor at Business Joensuu & Award winning innovator.
speakers.speaker5: Project Manager at University of Eastern Finland.
speakers.speaker6: Project coordinator at University of Eastern Finland.

footer.text: The expected release date of the beta version is during the second quarter of 2025.

home.seo: A Next Generation Marketplace Platform with Omnichannel Capabilities

landingPage.heading: A Next Generation Marketplace Platform with
landingPage.text: Vesko helps you integrate your brick-and-mortar store with your online shop, making the transition between digital browsing and physical shopping smooth and seamless for your customers. Vesko's omnichannel solution streamlines order management, allowing you to effortlessly sell the same products both online and in-store.

sellingPoint.heading: Vesko is A Marketplace,
sellingPoint.text: Vesko gives you a complete control on your store selling terms & conditions.
sellingPoint.option1Text: The built-in omnichannel system brings your store and its product line closer to your customer by giving them access to your inventory.
sellingPoint.option2Text: Why limit your sales to just one channel when you can utilise both? With Vesko, you can maximise your reach by selling seamlessly through both online and offline channels. Soon, Vesko will help you connect with customers across Finland and eventually, around the globe.
sellingPoint.option3Heading: Fulfill online orders from store shelf
sellingPoint.option3Text: Vesko is the world’s first e-commerce platform that will unify your offline and online inventory without requiring additional storage for online sales. This unique feature allows you to create an online store besides your brick-and-mortar store without the need for an online warehouse, maximising sales while minimising costs.
sellingPoint.option4Heading: Scalable store with built in inventory and order management system
sellingPoint.option4Text: In Vesko, your store can grow alongside your brand, it’s designed to handle a vast inventory, featuring a built-in search engine and customizable categorisation system to support your store growth.

orderManagement.heading: Integrated
orderManagement.heading2: System With A Built in Order Management System
orderManagement.paymentHeading: Secured payment powered by industry leaders
orderManagement.logisticHeading: Order management system integrated with logistics proividers
orderManagement.orderHeading: Optimised logistics for local and intercity shipment

home.mission: Our Mission is to connect you! At Vesko we are committed to bring authentic Finnish brands and stores closer to the Finnish Consumer.

brand.heading: Build your brand
brand.text: See how omnichannel powered marketplace will help you build your brand.
brand.textSpan: Be the first to access early version of Vesko.

hero.heading: An Omnichannel-Powered Online Store
hero.text: Vesko's online store helps you to boost your brick-and-mortar store's sales.

omnichannel.heading: What is an
omnichannel.text: The omnichannel system integrates your brick-and-mortar store with your online store, allowing local customers to access real-time product availability at your physical location. This integration helps you attract more local customers, boosting both your online and offline sales.

option1.heading: Separate Infrastructure
option1.text: Requires independent warehouses for online orders.

option2.heading: Complex Integration
option2.text: Time-consuming IT projects to integrate in-store and online systems.

option3.heading: Extensive Maintenance
option3.text: Needs dedicated teams to manage online inventory, logistics, and customer service.

option4.heading: High Costs
option4.text: Both implementation and operational maintenance costs are significantly high.

option5.heading: Long Implementation Time
option5.text: Traditional setups can take several months to over a year to go live.

whyVesko.heading: Why Vesko
whyVesko.text: Instead of paying a fortune, waiting for months, and hiring an IT team, you can get your omnichannel-powered online store up and running with Vesko in just minutes. It's an efficient, cost-effective, and hassle-free process.

option1.heading: New Stock
option1.text: You receive new items and you add it to your Vesko's online store (your customer will be informed about new products).

option2.heading: Product Availability
option2.text: Your customers will be able to see your store's inventory to check product's availability before buying it online or in store.

option3.heading: Purchasing
option3.text: Customer will be able book product, buy online & pickup in store, or have it deliver to their doors.

option4.heading: Continuous Updating
option4.text: After an item is being purchased, Vesko's store will update the item inventory balance.

uniqueOmnichannel.heading: Vesko's Omnichannel
uniqueOmnichannel.text: Vesko enables you to list the same item online and offline, the first platform in the world to have this feature. Means that you can fulfil online orders even from store shelves.

onlineStoreOverview.heading: A  scalable online store with unique messaging capabilities
onlineStoreOverview.headingSpan: designed to help you grow your brand.

benefits.heading: A Marketplace, But it's Your Own
benefits.text: With a built in inventory management system and own search engine,Vesko's store can meet your needs whether you're growing your brand or you have already a big store with hundreds of different products.

option1.heading: Inventory Management
option1.text: A predefined and customisable categorising process helps you to sort your product and do upselling.

option2.heading: Order Fulfillment
option2.text: Designed to help you fulfil and send an order out for delivery in few clicks.

option3.heading: Upselling
option3.text: Vesko's advance categorising and grouping system helps you to sell more even in the checkout process.

option4.heading: Sales Stats
option4.text: A comprehensive sales stats that help you in optimising and managing your store & sales.

logisticPayment.heading: Logistics & Payment in Vesko
logisticPayment.text: Vesko's stores come equipped with integrated logistics and payment solutions provided by industry leaders. Both will be fully operational and announced prior to Vesko's official launch.

pointOfSale.heading: A Point of Sale to
pointOfSale.text: Enhance your customers' purchasing experience and simplify your sales process with an efficient POS system. It not only benefits your customers but also keeps your stock and product availability up to date. Additionally, it's a crucial component of your omnichannel system.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.text: Vesko enables you to list the same item online and offline, the first platform in the world to have this feature. Means that you can fulfil online orders even from store shelves.
faq.text1: The beta version is expected to be ready in the second quarter of 2025. We will do two or four weeks of Beta testing in Tampere next spring to test the first version of Vesko. So, if you are a vendor from Tampere and you own or run a local retail store or online store, you can join the waitlist to be among the first who are going to test Vesko.
faq.heading2: Will Vesko be available in Mobile App?
faq.text2: Vesko will be available on web and mobile apps.
faq.text3: Vesko will be available in Finland during or after summer of 2025 and in the rest of Nordic countries about three months after launching in Finland.
faq.heading4: What rules does Vesko enforce on vendors?
faq.text4: For online vendors and brands, no mandatory rules will be imposed on their selling practices, such as enforced returns or reclamations. However, for physical store vendors, one key rule will be strictly enforced: the omnichannel pricing rule. Physical store owners will be required to maintain consistent pricing across both online and offline channels. This ensures that consumers will find the same prices in physical stores as they do in online stores, promoting a seamless and fair shopping experience.
faq.heading5: Who will be handling the customer service (consumer/shoppers)?
faq.text5: Vesko has a direct messaging feature that allows users and vendors to communicate directly, enabling consumers to address any issues or inquiries. Therefore, vendors handle their own customer service, providing personalized support and resolving customer concerns directly.

hero.heading: Shop & Connect
hero.text: Discover authentic products, engage with sellers, and enjoy a seamless shopping experience

localShopping.heading: See What your Local Retail Stores are Selling
localShopping.text: Soon you will be able to shop from your local retail stores with ease, see a real-time stock level to ensure you don’t waste your time on uncertain shopping trips.

options.heading: Explore How Vesko’s Buying Options Enhance Your Shopping Journey
options.option1Text: Why travel long distances to find a product? Through Vesko you can check who sells it and if it's available in-store or not.
options.option2Text: Vesko helps you to find products from local retails, Buy them Online in Vesko and Pick them In Store.
options.option3Text: Want to buy the last item but unsure if it meets your needs? Vesko lets you easily book it online.
options.option4Text: Prefer to stay home? We’ll deliver from your local store straight to your door.

onlineShopping.heading: It's Not Just About Local Retail,
onlineShopping.span: Vesko Connects You with Vendors Across Finland
onlineShopping.text: Shop online from a wide range of brands and retail stores across Finland. Vesko also lets you connect with vendors in unique ways, enhancing your customer service and shopping experience.

mission.heading: Our Mission is to connect You
mission.p1: Finland is home to many small stores and brands that offer unique & authentic products and items often crafted locally and sustainably. These products are distinct and often unavailable in large chain stores or through major foreign online vendors. Most of these firms are not able to list their product in online stores or do not have the opportunity to have an online presence.
mission.p2: At Vesko, we are committed to bridge this gap by giving the Finnish brands and stores an online presence, allowing you to discover and support these local firms and entrepreneurs, no matter where you are.

about.aboutImageAltText: Two reindeers in a snowy winter landscape, representing Vesko's connection to local businesses and community in a global market

p1.heading: Who Are We
p1.text: is a Finland-based company proudly operating from Joensuu, with a dynamic and diverse team of talented individuals. Our team includes both highly experienced engineers and fresh graduates, all united by a common goal: to help Finnish entrepreneurs grow their businesses.

p2.heading: What We Believe In
p2.text: At Vesko, we are transforming how small businesses thrive in a digital world. We believe that every brick-and-mortar  store should have the opportunity to expand its reach without sacrificing its personal touch, nor small online vendors. That’s why we’re building a next-generation marketplace that enables local retailers to create fully integrated omnichannel online stores in few minutes, without the high costs typically associated with such platforms.

p3.heading: We Are Here & We Will Make A Change
p3.text: We understand the complexities of managing both online and offline sales, and we’re here to simplify the process. With Vesko, merchants can seamlessly connect their physical stores to an online platform, making it easier to serve local customers while expanding their reach nationally and, eventually, globally.

p4.heading: We Understand The Pain
p4.text: As international giants and online marketplaces continue to dominate the Finnish market, local businesses are finding it increasingly difficult to compete with their scale and pricing. This challenge extends beyond retailers, impacting local manufacturers of Finnish-made goods and threatening the livelihoods of families who depend on these businesses.

p5.heading: We Will Do It!
p5.text: Our mission is to help these businesses grow by equipping them with the tools they need to compete with larger, foreign retailers, all while reducing overhead costs and time. We are passionate about creating a smarter and more connected shopping experience for everyone.

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.text1: Vesko Ltd. is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we handle your personal data. This policy may be updated, and the latest version can always be found on this page. We will also notify you of significant changes by email.
introduction.text2: This privacy policy applies to personal data we collect from the waitlist and the 'demo request' contact form. Vesko Ltd., business ID 3472131-6, is the controller responsible for your personal data.

purpose.heading: Purpose of Processing and Legal Basis

waitlist.heading: Waitlist
waitlist.text1: Joining the waitlist and sending you important updates regarding the development and release date of Vesko applications.
waitlist.text2: Contact information (name, phone number, email address).

options1.heading: Purpose of Processing:
options1.text: Sending demo requests and displaying product reviews on the website.

options2.heading: Categories of Personal Data:
options2.text: Contact information (name, phone number, email address).

dataProtection.heading: Protection and Retention of Personal Data
dataProtection.text1: Only authorised Vesko Ltd. employees have the right to access customer system data. Each system user has personal credentials and passwords, and employees use the data only as necessary for their work tasks.
dataProtection.text2: Personal data will be retained only as long as necessary to fulfil the purpose of the processing or as required by applicable laws. You may request the deletion of your data at any time.

dataTransfer.heading: Transfers of Data Outside the EU/EEA
dataTransfer.text: Personal data will only be processed within the EU/EEA.

personalDataRight.heading: Your Rights Regarding Personal Data

options1.heading: Right to Deletion:
options1.text: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data. We will delete your data if there is no legal basis for retaining it, such as a legal obligation. We will also delete the data if the processing was based on consent and you withdraw your consent, or if you object to the processing and there are no other legal grounds for processing.

options2.heading: Right to Object to Processing:
options2.text: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data, for example, if the processing is based on legitimate interest.

options3.heading: Right to Access Your Data:
options3.text: You have the right to request a copy of the personal data we have collected about you. If you make such a request, we may ask for additional information to verify your identity before releasing the data.

options4.heading: Right to Rectification:
options4.text: If you find that the information we have about you is inaccurate or incomplete, you have the right to request the correction of the data.

personalDataRight.privacyContactText: To exercise your rights, please contact us via email: vesko.finland@gmail.com

dataSharing.heading: Sharing Data with Third Parties
dataSharing.text: We do not share personal data with third parties without your consent.
